commands.name: Rotate Left
commands.prompt: Keep the scene and characters unchanged, but rotate the camera 45 degrees to the left around the scene center

commands.name: Rotate Right
commands.prompt: Keep the scene and characters unchanged, but rotate the camera 45 degrees to the right around the scene center

commands.name: Close-up Shot
commands.prompt: Keep the scene and characters unchanged, take a close-up shot with focus on the face, close-range photography

commands.name: Full Body Shot
commands.prompt: Keep the scene and characters unchanged, take a full body shot

commands.name: Top-down Shot
commands.prompt: Keep the scene and characters unchanged, shoot from above with a high angle shot, elevated perspective

commands.name: Bottom-up Shot
commands.prompt: Keep the scene and characters unchanged, shoot from below with a low angle shot, low perspective

commands.name: Back View Shot
commands.prompt: Keep the scene and characters unchanged, shoot from behind

commands.name: Aerial Shot
commands.prompt: Keep the scene and characters unchanged, simulate drone photography from above

commands.name: Natural Smile
commands.prompt: Natural warm smile with great charm

commands.name: Big Laugh
commands.prompt: Big laugh full of energy and joy

commands.name: Alluring
commands.prompt: Seductive and tempting expression, captivating the photographer

commands.name: Chin Up
commands.prompt: Slightly lift the chin, lengthen the neck line, showing confidence

commands.name: Hold Face
commands.prompt: Gently hold the face with both hands, tender and touching

commands.name: Look Away
commands.prompt: Naturally look away from the camera, creating mystery and naturalness

commands.name: Kiss Face
commands.prompt: Make a kiss face expression, cute and playful

commands.name: Heart Hands
commands.prompt: Make a heart gesture with both hands, expressing love

commands.name: Touch Face
commands.prompt: Gently touch the face with one hand, tender touch

commands.name: Touch Hair
commands.prompt: Gently touch the hair with one hand, showing gentle charm

commands.name: Touch Shoulder
commands.prompt: Gently touch the shoulder with one hand, elegant and natural

commands.name: Touch Neck
commands.prompt: Gently touch the neck with one hand, showing sexy charm

commands.name: Touch Arm
commands.prompt: Gently touch the arm with one hand, tender caress

commands.name: Beach
commands.prompt: Keep the subject unchanged, change the scene to beach or seaside, ocean atmosphere

commands.name: Rainy
commands.prompt: Keep the scene unchanged, change the weather to rainy, add rain effects and wet atmosphere

commands.name: Sunny
commands.prompt: Keep the scene unchanged, change the weather to sunny, add bright light and warm atmosphere

commands.name: Snowy
commands.prompt: Keep the scene unchanged, change the weather to snowy, add snow effects and winter atmosphere

commands.name: Underwater Color Correction
commands.prompt: Keep the scene and characters unchanged, correct underwater photography color cast, restore natural color balance, especially blue-green cast

commands.name: Motion Blur
commands.prompt: Add motion blur effect, create sense of movement and speed

commands.name: Vibrant
commands.prompt: Keep the scene and characters unchanged, adjust color saturation to make colors more vibrant or softer

commands.name: Remove Text
commands.prompt: Keep only the photo

commands.name: Anime Style
commands.prompt: Transform into Japanese anime style

commands.name: Vintage Film
commands.prompt: Keep the scene and characters unchanged, transform into vintage film look, nostalgic tones, with imperfections, imperfect exposure, add grain texture

commands.name: Classic B&W
commands.prompt: Keep the scene and characters unchanged, transform into classic black and white photo

commands.name: Fashion Magazine
commands.prompt: Keep the scene and characters unchanged, but transform into fashion magazine cover style, looking like a magazine cover with magazine logo text
